directions: Combine cream cheese and Cheddar cheese in a food processor; process until blended. Add meatless turkey slices, cranberries, pecans, celery, green onions, chives, salt, and black pepper. Process until smooth.
Spread cream cheese mixture onto each tortilla and roll up. Serve immediately or refrigerate until serving time.
ingredients: 12 meatless turkey-flavored deli slices (such as Tofurky®), chopped
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Thanksgiving Any Day Rollups
